Actions.Text: REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Requires specification of the average weekly paid wage to employees in contractors' annual employment reports
Summary: Requires specification of the average weekly paid wage to employees in contractors' annual employment reports, and requires such reports to be made available in a searchable public database on the public website of the state procurement council.
LawCode: Amd ยง163, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to purchasing services and commodities
